summary.para: Gets the kind of timed-text cue.

returns.para: Type:
Returns a -typed value that specifies the kind of timed-text cue.

summary.para: Gets the data content of the timed-text cue.

param.name: data
param.para: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the data content of the timed-text cue. This parameter can be NULL.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the duration time of the cue in the track.

returns.para: Type: double
Returns the duration time of the cue in the track.

summary.para: Gets the identifier of a timed-text cue.

returns.para: Type: DWORD
The identifier of a timed-text cue.

remarks.para: The identifier is retrieved by this method is dynamically generated by the system and is guaranteed to uniquely identify a cue within a single timed-text track. It is not guaranteed to be unique across tracks. If a cue already has an identifier that is provided in the text-track data format, this ID can be retrieved by calling .

summary.para: Gets a line of text in the cue from the index of the line.

param.name: index
param.para: The index of the line of text in the cue to retrieve.

param.name: line
param.para: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the line of text in the cue.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the number of lines of text in the timed-text cue.

returns.para: Type: DWORD
Returns the number of lines of text.

summary.para: Gets the cue identifier that is provided in the text-track data format, if available.

param.name: originalId
param.para: The cue identifier that is provided in the text-track data format.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method retrieves an identifier for the cue that is included in the source data, if one was specified. The system dynamically generates identifiers for cues that are guaranteed to be unique within a single time-text track. To obtain this system-generated ID, call .

summary.para: Gets info about the display region of the timed-text cue.

param.name: region
param.para: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the timed-text region. This parameter can be NULL.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the start time of the cue in the track.

returns.para: Type: double
Returns the start time of the cue in the track.

summary.para: Gets info about the style of the timed-text cue.

param.name: style
param.para: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the timed-text style. This parameter can be NULL.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the identifier of the timed-text cue.

returns.para: Type: DWORD
Returns the identifier of the timed-text cue.
